price: Musa akamwambia: Nikufuate ili unifunze katika ule uwongofu ulio funzwa wewe?
arabic: قَالَ لَهُۥ مُوسَىٰ هَلۡ أَتَّبِعُكَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تُعَلِّمَنِ مِمَّا عُلِّمۡتَ رُشۡدٗا
footnotes: Musa akamwambia yule mja mwema: Je nende nawe upate kunifunza nami aliyo kufunza Mwenyezi Mungu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla lahu mūsā hal attabiʿuka ʿalā an tuʿallimani mimmā ʿullim'ta rush'dan
